name: Kshitiz Agarwal
college: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University

education.school: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University

projects.name: Brain Bridge
projects.description: Engineering a Flutter Application, incorporating a state-of-the-art Long-Short-Ter-Memory(LSTM) neural network model for the precise prediction of cognitive disorders in children. Spearheaded the design and integration of therapeutic content, featuring intricate games and physical activities in the app.

projects.name: Saathi
projects.description: A serene, supportive environment offering therapeutic services to soothe, uplift, and empower patients on their journey.

projects.name: QuickConnect
projects.description: Engineered a Mobile Application, incorporated Sockets and Push-Notifications for both Android and IOS. The application handles Android Channels, Firebase, Cloud Firestore, Google Cloud Platform, and Cloud Messaging,etc.

experiences.description: Solely engineered and deployed both the Admin and User versions of the Parrotpe app for Android and iOS, integrating Firebase for backend services. Collaborated with brands to boost their customer base by 20%. Implemented brand discovery, cash back rewards, and social reward sharing, driving a 35% rise in user base.

Orchestrated seamless integration of essential Google Ads and Google AdMob, boosting app functionality and user engagement metrics by 40% through enhanced Crashlytics and Push Notifications performance in Android/IOS. Achieved over 25,000 downloads, demonstrating significant user adoption and high satisfaction.

Transformed app security with comprehensive management of app lifecycle events and advanced biometric features like Fingerprint Security and Face ID; enhanced user experience and security, cutting security breaches by 50%. Optimized app performance by integrating Providers and implementing the MVVM architecture; slashed app load time by 40% and decreased crash rates by 25%, resulting in a smoother user experience.

full_output.name: Kshitiz Agarwal
achievements_and_awards: Pupil Max(1226) Codeforces, Max(1697) Leetcode, 3 Star Codechef.
Solved more than 1500 problems on Codeforces, Leetcode, Codechef, GeeksforGeeks, Coding Ninjas etc.
Winner of RIISE Hackathon(2024), organized by IIIT, Delhi.
Runner up in SPHINX Hackathon(2023), conducted by MNIT, Jaipur.
Finalist in KAVACH-Cybersecurity Hackathon(2023), hosted by Ministry of Education, Govt. of India.
Second position in the Blind Coding Competition.
Runner up in Shankara Global Hackathon23, organized by Shankara University, Jaipur.
Finalist in Moksha-Innovision23 Hackathon, organized by NSUT, Delhi.
Ranked under 3000 on Codeforces contest among 30000+ participants.
